DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess similarity difference efficacy ( well drug work ) , safety , side effect olanzapine aripiprazole patient schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder , schizophreniform disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Olanzapine Versus Aripiprazole Treatment Acutely Ill Patients With Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Patients must schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder , schizophreniform disorder Patients must agitate Patients must display psychotic symptom Patients must inpatient expect stay hospital least 5 day Patients must 18 55 year age Patients may hospitalize great 72 hour prior study start Patients may receive one dose olanzapine aripiprazole within 72 hour prior study start Patients may actively suicidal Patients may diagnose substanceinduced psychosis substance dependence Patients may acute , serious , unstable medical condition
